name: OnPlayerRequestSpawn
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
tips: To prevent players from spawning with certain classes, the last viewed class must be saved in a variable in OnPlayerRequestClass.
description: Called when a player attempts to spawn via class selection either by pressing SHIFT or clicking the 'Spawn' button.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that requested to spawn.

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts so returning 0 there also blocks other scripts from seeing it.
related_cb:
OnPlayerSpawn: Called when a player spawns.
 OnPlayerRequestClass: Called when a player changes class at class selection.
